article_title: Five-way GOP contest for open House seat tops rural Canyon County races
article_text:
Five candidates seek to succeed outgoing Rep. Gail Batt

Senate race pits 8-term incumbent Patti Anne Lodge against real estate investor Zach Brooks

In third GOP primary, Kathryn Ralstin challenges Christy Perry, who is seeking fourth-term

article_metadata.news-keywords: Patti Anne Lodge, Christy Perry, Kathryn Ralstin, Scott Syme, Myron Amsden, Martin Galvin, Tammy Nichols, Mike Pullin, Zach Brooks, District 11 GOP primary, 2016 Idaho elections
article_metadata.description: Legislative District 11 in rural Canyon County has three Republican primaries on May 17, with five candidates facing off in a contest for an open House seat.
article_metadata.title: Five-way GOP contest for open House seat tops rural Canyon County races | Idaho Statesman
